products.title: Caden Retro Cream Sofa
products.description: A retro-inspired cream sofa with clean lines and comfortable, modern cushioning.

attributes.material: Hardwood frame, high-density foam cushioning, premium fabric upholstery

products.warranty: 1-Year Limited Warranty: Covers manufacturing defects in frame/structure and hardware under normal indoor use. Excludes wear & tear, accidental damage, stains, water/heat damage, misuse, commercial use, or unauthorized repairs.
careInstructions: Keep away from direct sunlight and heat sources to reduce fading and warping.
Use coasters/mats for hot or cold items to prevent rings and heat marks.
Wipe spills immediately with a clean dry cloth; blot—do not rub aggressively.
Dust regularly using a microfiber cloth; avoid abrasive scrubbers.
Do not use harsh chemicals or bleach; test cleaners on a hidden area first.
Lift furniture to move—do not drag; use felt pads under accessories and décor.
For upholstery, vacuum weekly using a soft brush attachment and rotate cushions periodically (if removable).

Do not use harsh chemicals or bleach; test cleaners on a hidden area first.
Lift furniture to move—do not drag; use felt pads under accessories and décor.
For upholstery, vacuum weekly using a soft brush attachment and rotate cushions periodically (if removable).
